014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
017import java.lang.reflect.Type;
018import java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable;
019import java.sql.ResultSet;
020import java.sql.SQLException;
021import java.util.AbstractMap;
022import java.util.Map;
023import java.util.Optional;
024
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
027
028import static org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes.getErasedType;
029import static org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes.resolveType;
030
031/**
032 * Maps rows to {@link Map.Entry Map.Entry&lt;K, V&gt;}, provided there are mappers registered for types K and V. This mapper is registered out of the box.
033 *
034 * @param <K> entry key type
035 * @param <V> entry value type
036 */
037@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
038public class MapEntryMapper<K, V> implements RowMapper<Map.Entry<K, V>> {
039    private static final TypeVariable<Class<Map.Entry>> KEY_PARAM;
040    private static final TypeVariable<Class<Map.Entry>> VALUE_PARAM;
041
042    static {
043        TypeVariable<Class<Map.Entry>>[] mapParams = Map.Entry.class.getTypeParameters();
044        KEY_PARAM = mapParams[0];
045        VALUE_PARAM = mapParams[1];
046    }
047
048    private final RowMapper<K> keyMapper;
049    private final RowMapper<V> valueMapper;
050
051    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
052    static RowMapperFactory factory() {
053        return (type, config) -> {
054            if (type instanceof ParameterizedType && getErasedType(type).equals(Map.Entry.class)) {
055                Type keyType = resolveType(KEY_PARAM, type);
056                Type valueType = resolveType(VALUE_PARAM, type);
057
058                RowMapper<?> keyMapper = getKeyMapper(keyType, config);
059                RowMapper<?> valueMapper = getValueMapper(valueType, config);
060
061                return Optional.of(new MapEntryMapper(keyMapper, valueMapper));
062            }
063            return Optional.empty();
064        };
065    }
066
067    private static RowMapper<?> getKeyMapper(Type keyType, ConfigRegistry config) {
068        String column = config.get(MapEntryMappers.class).getKeyColumn();
069        if (column == null) {
070            return config.get(RowMappers.class)
071                    .findFor(keyType)
072                    .orElseThrow(() -> new NoSuchMapperException("No row mapper registered for map key " + keyType));
073        } else {
074            return config.get(ColumnMappers.class)
075                    .findFor(keyType)
076                    .map(mapper -> new SingleColumnMapper<>(mapper, column))
077                    .orElseThrow(() -> new NoSuchMapperException("No column mapper registered for map key " + keyType + " in column " + column));
078        }
079    }
080
081    private static RowMapper<?> getValueMapper(Type valueType, ConfigRegistry config) {
082        String column = config.get(MapEntryMappers.class).getValueColumn();
083        if (column == null) {
084            return config.get(RowMappers.class)
085                    .findFor(valueType)
086                    .orElseThrow(() -> new NoSuchMapperException("No row mapper registered for map value " + valueType));
087        } else {
088            return config.get(ColumnMappers.class)
089                    .findFor(valueType)
090                    .map(mapper -> new SingleColumnMapper<>(mapper, column))
091                    .orElseThrow(() -> new NoSuchMapperException("No column mapper registered for map value " + valueType + " in column " + column));
092        }
093    }
094
095    private MapEntryMapper(RowMapper<K> keyMapper, RowMapper<V> valueMapper) {
096        this.keyMapper = keyMapper;
097        this.valueMapper = valueMapper;
098    }
099
100    @Override
101    public Map.Entry<K, V> map(ResultSet rs, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
102        return new AbstractMap.SimpleImmutableEntry<>(keyMapper.map(rs, ctx), valueMapper.map(rs, ctx));
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public RowMapper<Map.Entry<K, V>> specialize(ResultSet rs, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
107        return new MapEntryMapper<>(keyMapper.specialize(rs, ctx), valueMapper.specialize(rs, ctx));
108    }
109
110}
